specs.title: should fail to add item with invalid quantity
should return 400 for invalid userId format if applicable
should handle adding non-existent product
Health check should return 200 when Product Service is reachable
Readiness check should return 503 when Product Service is down

annotations.description: System must return 503 if critical dependency is unreachable
System must return 503 if critical dependency is unreachable

specs.title: Dependency status should include response time
Liveness check should NOT fail when Product Service is down
Liveness endpoint /api/cart/health/live should exist and return 200
Readiness endpoint /api/cart/health/ready should exist
Liveness should be lightweight (no dependency checks)
Readiness should include comprehensive checks
Health check should include memory metrics
Health check should include cart count
Service should report unhealthy if memory exceeds threshold
Consecutive health checks should return cached results
Cache should expire after 30 seconds
Docker health check endpoint /api/cart/health/ready should be accessible
Readiness check should respond within Docker default timeout (default 5s)
Liveness check should return 200 Healthy
Readiness check should return 200 when all dependencies are healthy
Health check should include detailed status and response times
Health check should include resource metrics
Gateway health should aggregate all services
Gateway info should return version and service list
should complete a full user journey
